name: Turrets Zone
description:
"3D tower defense game, with fun mechanics and simple, yet eye-catching graphics" GOG.com

This game is a 3D edition from classic genre: Tower Defense. It is in very early stage but playable, I will also always work and add new enemies and posibbly turrets. If you encounter any bugs please do not leave a bad rating, because you can report it to me and I will work very hard to fix it as soon as posibble. This is my first ever game so I hope you like it.
